paper.title: Research on University Financial Risk's Early-warning Levels Design Based on Threshold Value Analysis
paper.abstract: Based on the financial statements between 2003 and 2007 of 76 universities, which are subordinate to the Ministry of Education, this paper achieves a design of university financial risk's early-warning levels by selecting threshold value in univariate statistic and establishing discriminant rules in multivariate analysis. Based on this study, we apply this design to the 76 universities and realize the financial risk's level classification.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究大学财务风险的早期预警级别设计，通过阈值分析和判别规则建立来实现风险分类，这属于金融风险管理的范畴。
